net.javachallenge.api

Interface TrianglePoint

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public interface TrianglePoint
extends java.io.Serializable
    The TrianglePoint class represents the coordinates of the game map. Note that this interface is immutable, thus, its object stores the information of just this turn and will not be updated.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getDistance(TrianglePoint to)
      Returns the distance to the point to
      java.util.ArrayList<TrianglePoint> getShortestPath(TrianglePoint to)
      Returns the shortest path from this position to the specified position as a copied mutable list.
      int getX()
      Returns the horizontal coordinate of the point.
      int getY()
      Returns the vertical coordinate of the point.
      boolean isConnected(TrianglePoint that)
      Returns true if this and that are connected, else otherwise
      boolean isDownwardTriangle()
      Returns true if the triangle is downward, false otherwise
      boolean isUpwardTriangle()
      Returns true if the triangle is upward, false otherwise
      java.lang.String toStringForCommand()
      Returns a string representation of the point to display in commands.
